name: Star Rangers
description:
Star Rangers is an isometric spaceship RPG.

The game takes place in the distant future of our galaxy, a stage where mankind has already mastered the technology that allows it to travel among the stars.

You find yourself on a station in one of the distant sectors on the edge of the galaxy. The fleet is wrecked and the station is severely damaged, with no connection to your home system.
You have to survive by clearing the sector of enemies, establish communication and find out what happened...

  • Fighting security drones
  • To study technology
  • Search and rescue survivors
  • Upgrade crew skills
